data.text:
One day in the evening. Passing by the river 
bank on the way home from shopping――
data.processed:
<story>One day in the evening. Passing by the river 
<story>bank on the way home from shopping――

data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>――――HA！！

data.text:
With an astounding sharpness, a loud voice rang out. 
Surprised, I came to a stop. Without thinking, 
I looked in the direction it came from――
data.processed:
<story>With an astounding sharpness, a loud voice rang out. 
<story>Surprised, I came to a stop. Without thinking, 
<story>I looked in the direction it came from――

data.text:
Suuu――………… 
Fuuー…………。
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: If I'm not mistaken, she's…… Yaeno Muteki……？
choices.processed: <size=34>If I'm not mistaken, she's…… Yaeno Muteki……？</size>

data.processed:
<story>Suuu――………… 
<story>Fuuー…………。

data.text:
――Fuu! ……Haaa! 
……Seii! ……Taaa!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>――Fuu! ……Haaa! 
<story>……Seii! ……Taaa!

data.text:
In the evening air, her fighting spirit cut through 
the air as each swing of her fist, each kick, and 
each slash, caused the ground to shake――
data.processed:
<story>In the evening air, her fighting spirit cut through 
<story>the air as each swing of her fist, each kick, and 
<story>each slash, caused the ground to shake――

data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Fuu――――…………！！ 
<story>――――Haaa!!

data.text: …………Fuuu.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>…………Fuuu.

data.text:
……before I realized it, I was captivated. She was the epitome of 
fierceness and serenity. Every part of her body moved with a 
refined grace, the result of diligent training……
data.processed:
<story>……before I realized it, I was captivated. She was the epitome of 
<story>fierceness and serenity. Every part of her body moved with a 
<story>refined grace, the result of diligent training……

data.text: ――Excuse me. You over there.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>――Excuse me. You over there.

data.text:
Judging by the badge on your collar, I assume you are a trainer from the academy. 
Do you have some business with me?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: Not really…… sorry, I was just fascinated……
choices.processed: <size=37>Not really…… sorry, I was just fascinated……</size>

data.processed:
<story>Judging by the badge on your collar, I assume you are a trainer from the academy. 
<story>Do you have some business with me?

data.text:
That's…… no, someone as inexperienced 
as I is undeserving of such praise.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>That's…… no, someone as inexperienced 
<story>as I is undeserving of such praise.

data.text:
Even now, I'm performing these 『Kata』 to purge my idle thoughts, 
to calm the uncontrollable emotions coursing through me in 
prepartion for tomorrow's Selection Race.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Even now, I'm performing these 『Kata』 to purge my idle thoughts, 
<story>to calm the uncontrollable emotions coursing through me in 
<story>prepartion for tomorrow's Selection Race.

data.text:
However, even if my training has been insufficient, 
tomorrow I intend to use my full power. ……if you have the time, and find 
yourself there, it would be fortuitous.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>However, even if my training has been insufficient, 
<story>tomorrow I intend to use my full power. ……if you have the time, and find 
<story>yourself there, it would be fortuitous.

data.text:
Somehow, she gave off the impression of an old-timey martial 
artist with her speech and conduct, unconciously it caused me to 
straighten up and respond in kind.
data.processed:
<story>Somehow, she gave off the impression of an old-timey martial 
<story>artist with her speech and conduct, unconciously it caused me to 
<story>straighten up and respond in kind.

data.text: Thereupon, they appeared――！！
data.processed: <story>Thereupon, they appeared――！！

data.text:
Oi oi oi oi！ Looks like we've got a little bit of a problem here, 
Tracen Academy missy！ This here's our 『Turf』, you know～！？
data.name: Delinquent Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Oi oi oi oi！ Looks like we've got a little bit of a problem here, 
<story>Tracen Academy missy！ This here's our 『Turf』, you know～！？

data.text:
If you wanna pass through, I guess we'll 
have to extract a 『Toll』 from ya～！！
data.name: Delinquent Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>If you wanna pass through, I guess we'll 
<story>have to extract a 『Toll』 from ya～！！

data.text:
Suddenly, what seemed to be some illーtempered 
Uma Musume appeared……！
data.processed:
<story>Suddenly, what seemed to be some illーtempered 
<story>Uma Musume appeared……！

data.text:
…… your 『Turf』, you say? If I recall correctly, I believe this 
place is considered a part of the riverside park, is it not？
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>…… your 『Turf』, you say? If I recall correctly, I believe this 
<story>place is considered a part of the riverside park, is it not？

data.text:
Shut yer trap～～～！ Don't get smart with me！！ 
Aneki, this pinhead is gettin' kinda mouthy！！
data.name: Delinquent Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Shut yer trap～～～！ Don't get smart with me！！ 
<story>Aneki, this pinhead is gettin' kinda mouthy！！

data.text:
……how brave of you. But that spirit, how long will it last? 
If you don't wanna get hurt, you should probably 
do what we say―― run―crazed missy.
data.name: Delinquent Uma Musume B
data.processed:
<story>……how brave of you. But that spirit, how long will it last? 
<story>If you don't wanna get hurt, you should probably 
<story>do what we say―― run―crazed missy.

data.text:
The delinquent Uma Musume that looked like the leader started 
releasing an intimidating aura！ ……since it's come this far I 
can't stand here and do nothing！！

choices.text: You all need to stop this……！
You all need to stop this……！

data.processed:
<story>The delinquent Uma Musume that looked like the leader started 
<story>releasing an intimidating aura！ ……since it's come this far I 
<story>can't stand here and do nothing！！

data.text:
Huuuh！？ 
Who the hell are you？ Don't order me around――！
data.name: Delinquent Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Huuuh！？ 
<story>Who the hell are you？ Don't order me around――！

data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>――――HAA！！！！

data.name: Horsegirls
data.processed:
<story>Hyaa……！！ 
<story>……！！

data.text:
With that one sharp voice from Yaeno Muteki, the delinquent Uma 
Musume froze in place as if they were struck by lightning……！
data.processed:
<story>With that one sharp voice from Yaeno Muteki, the delinquent Uma 
<story>Musume froze in place as if they were struck by lightning……！

data.text: Well then. ……――do you still wish to continue？
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Well then. ……――do you still wish to continue？

data.text:
The air fell completely silent, like the tranquil surface of water―― 
however, there was something unfathomable 
hidden behind her words. Then……
data.processed:
<story>The air fell completely silent, like the tranquil surface of water―― 
<story>however, there was something unfathomable 
<story>hidden behind her words. Then……

data.text: ……Let's go. She's out of our league.
data.name: Delinquent Uma Musume B
data.processed: <story>……Let's go. She's out of our league.

data.text:
Eh, huh, Aneki！？ 
W-wait for meee～～～！！
data.name: Delinquent Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Eh, huh, Aneki！？ 
<story>W-wait for meee～～～！！

data.text:
……while it was for the purpose of chasing them off, 
I apologize for suddenly letting out such 
a loud voice. I'm sure you were surprised.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: No, I'm grateful for your help

data.processed:
<story>……while it was for the purpose of chasing them off, 
<story>I apologize for suddenly letting out such 
<story>a loud voice. I'm sure you were surprised.

data.text:
Besides, while she had enough ferocity to freeze 
those delinquents in their tracks, seeing her 
so calmy stand there without flinching――
data.processed:
<story>Besides, while she had enough ferocity to freeze 
<story>those delinquents in their tracks, seeing her 
<story>so calmy stand there without flinching――

data.text: ……much obliged.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>……much obliged.

data.text:
Just what kind of run would she show off at the race？ 
With high expectations in mind, we parted ways.
data.processed:
<story>Just what kind of run would she show off at the race？ 
<story>With high expectations in mind, we parted ways.

data.text:
And then, the next day. While carrying those expectations 
in my heart, when I went to see the Selection Race 
Yaeno Muteki was entering――
data.processed:
<story>And then, the next day. While carrying those expectations 
<story>in my heart, when I went to see the Selection Race 
<story>Yaeno Muteki was entering――

data.text:
Super Creek's run just now, it was wonderful wasn't it……！？ 
There already seems to be a certain presence about her.
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Super Creek's run just now, it was wonderful wasn't it……！？ 
<story>There already seems to be a certain presence about her.

data.text:
Oguri Cap too…… the title of "Monster" certainly 
seems to fit her. She's still a little rough but, 
you can't say that there's no potential.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Oguri Cap too…… the title of "Monster" certainly 
<story>seems to fit her. She's still a little rough but, 
<story>you can't say that there's no potential.

data.text:
There seem to be a lot of girls with very promising futures, too…… 
it seems there will be quite a few 
future champions from this generation.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>There seem to be a lot of girls with very promising futures, too…… 
<story>it seems there will be quite a few 
<story>future champions from this generation.

data.text:
…… Me too…… this time for sure, I must get results. 
I must show the results of my training with a victory 
I can be proud of, this time for sure……！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>…… Me too…… this time for sure, I must get results. 
<story>I must show the results of my training with a victory 
<story>I can be proud of, this time for sure……！

data.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Haa, haa, haa, haa……

data.text:
…… 
……Alright, right here―― Haaaaaaa！！
data.name: Participating Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>…… 
<story>……Alright, right here―― Haaaaaaa！！

data.text: ！！ …… I wont…… let you……！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>！！ …… I wont…… let you……！！

data.text: ――OooooooooOOOOOo！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>――OooooooooOOOOOo！！

data.text: Fufuu, she took the bait……！
data.name: Participating Uma Musume A
data.processed: <story>Fufuu, she took the bait……！

data.text:
Yaeno Muteki…… she fell for it, huh. Her emotions are too easy to 
read. Like that, her legs won't last until the end.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Yaeno Muteki…… she fell for it, huh. Her emotions are too easy to 
<story>read. Like that, her legs won't last until the end.

data.text:
Yeah, 『Again』 it seems…… I had been considering her but, as long 
as she isn't able to fix that habit, it'll be rough……
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, 『Again』 it seems…… I had been considering her but, as long 
<story>as she isn't able to fix that habit, it'll be rough……

data.text:
……it was a strange sight. Yesterday she had shown 
me her fierce spirit, calm bearing, and serene 
demeanor, but today Yaeno Muteki――
data.processed:
<story>……it was a strange sight. Yesterday she had shown 
<story>me her fierce spirit, calm bearing, and serene 
<story>demeanor, but today Yaeno Muteki――

data.text:
Just like this…… I'll push… through……！！ 
Haaaaaaaaa！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Just like this…… I'll push… through……！！ 
<story>Haaaaaaaaa！！

data.text: …… haaa, haaa……！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>…… haaa, haaa……！！

data.text:
It just seemed like she was being flung about by the 
fierce and violent emotions overflowing from within 
as she ran, she was made to suffer defeat……
data.processed:
<story>It just seemed like she was being flung about by the 
<story>fierce and violent emotions overflowing from within 
<story>as she ran, she was made to suffer defeat……

data.text: Haaa, haaa, haaa, haaa……！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Haaa, haaa, haaa, haaa……！！

data.text: Kuu…… again, I…… once again……！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Kuu…… again, I…… once again……！

data.text:
Immature！ Too much so……I'm too immature！！ For the sake of 
controlling this 『Ardent Flame』 within me, I need more……！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Immature！ Too much so……I'm too immature！！ For the sake of 
<story>controlling this 『Ardent Flame』 within me, I need more……！

data.text:
In that profile there was an excessive amount of regret…… 
I was unable to call out and stop Yaeno Muteki as she departed.
data.processed:
<story>In that profile there was an excessive amount of regret…… 
<story>I was unable to call out and stop Yaeno Muteki as she departed.
